content: Does anyone know the json path to disable showWorkspaceLoadedNotification in sublime?
@Jacob Rosenthal oups, looks like we forgot to properly document this? See https://github.com/rust-analyzer/rust-analyzer/pull/2065

So after a bunch more trial and error :) that would appear to go at clients.rust-analyzer.initializationOptions.featureFlags.notifications.workspace-loaded
Thanks so much
If you could send a patch to the docs with this info, it can save some time for the next person :)
